items.title: Russia hits Ukraine as US reports progress in talks with Kyiv
items.description: France's president condemns the attack and announces talks in London on Monday with Ukrainian, British and German leaders.

items.title: 'We've lost everything': Australia wildfire rips through homes
items.description: Multiple homes were left damaged after a wildfire swept through a coastal area north of Sydney.

items.title: Bethlehem Christmas tree lights up for first time since start of Gaza war
items.description: For the past two years all public Christmas celebrations have been cancelled in Bethlehem in the occupied West Bank.

items.title: At least 11 killed in South Africa mass shooting
items.description: Gunmen stormed a hostel near Pretoria and opened fire, killing 11 people including a three-year-old.

items.title: Deadly border fighting breaks out between Pakistan and Afghanistan
items.description: Both sides accuse the other of starting the overnight fighting and breaching a fragile ceasefire agreed in October.
